alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 16 at 3:06PM EDT until April 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 15 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. The heaviest snow accumulations will be in the Porkies and in the western portions of the county with amounts decreasing with distance away from Lake Superior. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Ontonagon County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
